# Check that signs are still placed despite QuickfixAutoDiagnostics being turned off

vim ex 'e main.go'
errlogmatch -wait 30s 'sendJSONMsg: \[0,\[\d+,"call","s:batchCall",\[\["call","s:mustBeZero","sign_unplace","govim"\],\["call","s:mustNothing","sign_placelist",\[\{"buffer":1,"group":"govim"'
vim -indent expr 'sign_getplaced(\"main.go\", {\"group\": \"*\"})'
! stderr .+
cmp stdout placed.golden

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

-- main.go --
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Printf("This is a test %v\n", i, v)
}

func f1() string {}
func f2() string {}

-- placed.golden --
[
  {
    "bufnr": 1,
    "signs": [
      {
        "group": "govim",
        "id": 2,
        "lnum": 6,
        "name": "govimErrSign",
        "priority": 14
      },
      {
        "group": "govim",
        "id": 1,
        "lnum": 6,
        "name": "govimErrSign",
        "priority": 14
      },
      {
        "group": "govim",
        "id": 3,
        "lnum": 9,
        "name": "govimErrSign",
        "priority": 14
      },
      {
        "group": "govim",
        "id": 4,
        "lnum": 10,
        "name": "govimErrSign",
        "priority": 14
      }
    ]
  }
]
